Title: Future
Writer: Taku Kishimoto (composition), Kei Sambe (manga), Alexander Von David (english script)
Actors: David W. Collins, Sara Cravens, Ben Diskin, D.C. Douglas
Plot: Satoru wakes up in the year 2003, having been in a coma for fifteen years following Yashiro's attempt to kill him, and discovers that he has lost most of his memories, including the killer's identity.
